onlyHelper.intro: Seu site recebe visitas. Sua equipe quer atender bem. O que falta √© a ponte: um canal direto, em tempo real, sem e-mail perdido e sem fila na m√£o. O OnlyHelper √© essa ponte ‚Äî uma plataforma de comunica√ß√£o multicanal para voc√™ colocar suporte por chat no seu site, com fila organizada, hist√≥rico e gest√£o simples.
onlyHelper.problemTitle: O problema que a gente resolve
onlyHelper.problem: Visitantes desistem quando precisam preencher formul√°rio ou esperar resposta por e-mail. Atendentes perdem tempo entre abas, planilhas e "quem pegou esse ticket?". Gestores n√£o sabem quem est√° na fila, em que assunto, e quem est√° atendendo. O OnlyHelper organiza tudo: um bot√£o no site, uma fila em tempo real, um chat com hist√≥rico e uma tela de gest√£o para quem manda no time.
onlyHelper.howStep1: No site do seu cliente ‚Äî Um bot√£o de suporte (embed) aparece na p√°gina. O visitante clica.
onlyHelper.howStep2: Escolha do assunto ‚Äî Ele v√™ os assuntos configurados (ex.: Vendas, Suporte t√©cnico, Financeiro) e escolhe um. Isso j√° cria o ticket e coloca ele na fila certa.
onlyHelper.howStep3: Na fila ‚Äî Quem tem aquele assunto na equipe v√™ o visitante na fila, em tempo real. Um atendente clica em "Assumir" e o ticket passa a ser dele.
onlyHelper.howStep4: No chat ‚Äî Visitante e atendente conversam por mensagens. D√° para enviar imagens (anexos). Tudo fica salvo no hist√≥rico do ticket.
onlyHelper.howStep5: Encerramento ‚Äî Quando acabar, o atendente encerra o ticket. Se o visitante voltar depois, pode abrir um novo atendimento e escolher o assunto de novo.
onlyHelper.howClosing: Tudo isso em um √∫nico painel: fila, atendimentos ativos e chat, atualizando na hora.

onlyHelper.tech: Tecnologia: WebSocket em tempo real, sess√£o do visitante, autentica√ß√£o, interface responsiva.

faq.q1: A OnlyFlow est√° em conformidade com a LGPD?

privacy.title: Pol√≠tica de Privacidade
privacy.intro1: A OnlyFlow ("n√≥s", "nosso" ou "aplicativo") √© uma plataforma de automa√ß√£o e gest√£o de comunica√ß√£o multicanal que centraliza WhatsApp, Instagram e outras integra√ß√µes em um √∫nico ambiente. Esta Pol√≠tica de Privacidade descreve como coletamos, usamos, armazenamos e protegemos suas informa√ß√µes pessoais.
privacy.agreement: Ao utilizar nossos servi√ßos, voc√™ concorda com a coleta e uso de informa√ß√µes de acordo com esta pol√≠tica. Esta pol√≠tica est√° em conformidade com a Lei Geral de Prote√ß√£o de Dados (LGPD - Lei n¬∫ 13.709/2018) e com as pol√≠ticas do Google API Services User Data Policy.
privacy.s2Title: 2. Dados do Google - Integra√ß√£o com Google Sheets e Google Drive
privacy.s2_1Intro: O aplicativo OnlyFlow solicita acesso aos seguintes dados do Google atrav√©s do OAuth 2.0:
privacy.s2_1Sheets: Google Sheets API (escopo: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets): Acesso para criar, editar e gerenciar planilhas do Google Sheets; leitura e escrita de dados em c√©lulas; cria√ß√£o de novas planilhas e abas.
privacy.s2_1Drive: Google Drive API (escopo: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.readonly): Acesso somente leitura para listar planilhas existentes do usu√°rio; visualiza√ß√£o de metadados b√°sicos (ID, nome, URL). N√£o acessa outros arquivos do Drive, apenas planilhas do Google Sheets.
privacy.s2_1Important: Importante: O aplicativo n√£o acessa, l√™ ou modifica outros dados do Google Drive al√©m das planilhas do Google Sheets. N√£o acessamos emails, documentos, fotos ou qualquer outro tipo de arquivo.
privacy.oauth1: Solicita√ß√£o de acesso: Quando o usu√°rio adiciona um n√≥ "Planilha" em um workflow no MindOnlyFlow e clica em "Autenticar com Google", o sistema gera uma URL de autoriza√ß√£o OAuth 2.0.
privacy.oauth2: Consentimento do usu√°rio: O usu√°rio √© redirecionado para a p√°gina de consentimento do Google, onde visualiza os escopos solicitados e autoriza o acesso.
privacy.oauth3: Obten√ß√£o de tokens: Ap√≥s autoriza√ß√£o, o Google retorna um c√≥digo de autoriza√ß√£o que √© trocado por tokens de acesso (access_token e refresh_token).
privacy.oauth4: Armazenamento seguro: Os tokens s√£o armazenados de forma criptografada no banco de dados, associados exclusivamente ao ID do usu√°rio.
privacy.oauth5: Renova√ß√£o autom√°tica: O sistema utiliza o refresh_token para renovar automaticamente o access_token quando necess√°rio, sem requerer nova autoriza√ß√£o do usu√°rio.
privacy.useIntro: Os dados do Google s√£o utilizados exclusivamente para:
privacy.use1: Cria√ß√£o de novas planilhas no Google Sheets do usu√°rio;
privacy.use2: Inser√ß√£o de dados de contatos, conversas e informa√ß√µes de workflows nas planilhas criadas ou selecionadas pelo usu√°rio (incluindo leads que v√™m do WhatsApp ou Typebot, funcionando como n√≥s dentro do MindOnlyFlow);
privacy.use3: Listagem de planilhas existentes para sele√ß√£o na interface;
privacy.use4: Leitura de metadados (nome, ID, URL) para exibi√ß√£o na plataforma;
privacy.use5: Uso exclusivo dentro do pr√≥prio aplicativo OnlyFlow, sem outras finalidades.
privacy.shareIntro: N√£o compartilhamos dados do Google com terceiros. Especificamente:
privacy.share1: Os tokens e dados acessados via Google APIs n√£o s√£o compartilhados, vendidos ou transferidos;
privacy.share2: A comunica√ß√£o ocorre diretamente entre o servidor do OnlyFlow e as APIs oficiais do Google, sem intermedi√°rios;
privacy.share3: N√£o vendemos, alugamos ou compartilhamos seus dados do Google com empresas de publicidade, corretores de dados ou qualquer outro terceiro.
privacy.storage1: Apenas os tokens OAuth (access_token e refresh_token) s√£o armazenados no banco de dados, associados ao ID do usu√°rio;
privacy.storage2: Os tokens s√£o armazenados em servidor seguro com criptografia em tr√¢nsito (HTTPS) e em repouso;
privacy.storage3: O OnlyFlow n√£o armazena o conte√∫do das planilhas do Google; os dados permanecem exclusivamente na conta Google do usu√°rio.
privacy.security2: Acesso restrito apenas ao pr√≥prio usu√°rio;
privacy.security3: Comunica√ß√£o com APIs do Google via HTTPS;
privacy.security4: Tokens nunca expostos em logs ou interfaces p√∫blicas;
privacy.security5: Medidas t√©cnicas e organizacionais para proteger contra acesso n√£o autorizado, altera√ß√£o ou destrui√ß√£o.
privacy.retain: Reten√ß√£o de tokens: Os tokens OAuth s√£o mantidos enquanto o usu√°rio utilizar a funcionalidade de integra√ß√£o com Google Sheets. O usu√°rio pode revogar o acesso a qualquer momento atrav√©s das configura√ß√µes de seguran√ßa do Google.
privacy.delete1: Tokens s√£o automaticamente removidos quando o usu√°rio revoga o acesso no Google;
privacy.delete2: O usu√°rio pode solicitar exclus√£o entrando em contato pelo email contato@onlyflow.com.br;
privacy.delete3: Ao excluir a conta no OnlyFlow, todos os tokens associados s√£o automaticamente removidos.
privacy.sheetData: Dados nas planilhas: como os dados s√£o inseridos diretamente nas planilhas do Google do usu√°rio, eles permanecem sob controle total do usu√°rio. O OnlyFlow n√£o mant√©m c√≥pias desses dados e n√£o pode acess√°-los ap√≥s a revoga√ß√£o dos tokens.
privacy.processLabel: Processo de exclus√£o: para solicitar a exclus√£o dos tokens armazenados, o usu√°rio pode:
privacy.process1: Revogar o acesso diretamente no Google (recomendado) em myaccount.google.com/permissions;
privacy.process2: Entrar em contato com nosso suporte via email em contato@onlyflow.com.br;
privacy.whatsapp: Coletamos mensagens, contatos, grupos e hist√≥rico de conversas para funcionamento do CRM e automa√ß√µes. Esses dados s√£o utilizados exclusivamente para fornecer as funcionalidades de comunica√ß√£o e gest√£o de relacionamento.
privacy.meta: Quando voc√™ conecta sua conta Instagram via OAuth Meta, coletamos informa√ß√µes de perfil, mensagens diretas, coment√°rios e intera√ß√µes para fornecer automa√ß√µes baseadas em palavras-chave, respostas autom√°ticas e envio de DMs.
privacy.metaRevoke: Voc√™ pode revogar o acesso a qualquer momento em facebook.com/settings
privacy.openai: Para processamento de linguagem natural e agentes de IA, enviamos conversas e contexto para processamento pela OpenAI. N√£o armazenamos dados pessoais no OpenAI. Os dados processados incluem mensagens de conversas e hist√≥rico de intera√ß√µes para fornecer respostas autom√°ticas com contexto, mem√≥ria de conversas, transcri√ß√£o de √°udio e qualifica√ß√£o de leads.
privacy.openaiLink: Para mais informa√ß√µes, consulte a Pol√≠tica de Privacidade da OpenAI.
privacy.typebot: Quando voc√™ utiliza a integra√ß√£o com Typebot, compartilhamos informa√ß√µes de conversas e leads para processamento no Typebot, funcionando como n√≥s dentro do MindOnlyFlow.
privacy.registration: Coletamos informa√ß√µes como nome, e-mail, telefone e outras informa√ß√µes fornecidas durante o cadastro e uso da plataforma.
privacy.usage: Coletamos informa√ß√µes sobre como voc√™ utiliza nossa plataforma, incluindo logs de acesso, a√ß√µes realizadas e prefer√™ncias de configura√ß√£o.
privacy.how1: Fornecer, manter e melhorar nossos servi√ßos;
privacy.how5: Detectar e prevenir fraudes e abusos;
privacy.how7: Sincronizar leads com Google Sheets atrav√©s de workflows;
privacy.how8: Processar mensagens com OpenAI para respostas autom√°ticas;
privacy.cookies: Utilizamos cookies e tecnologias similares para melhorar sua experi√™ncia, analisar o uso do servi√ßo e personalizar conte√∫do. Voc√™ pode gerenciar suas prefer√™ncias de cookies atrav√©s das configura√ß√µes do navegador.
privacy.rightsIntro: De acordo com a LGPD, voc√™ tem os seguintes direitos em rela√ß√£o aos seus dados pessoais:
privacy.right1: Confirma√ß√£o e acesso: solicitar confirma√ß√£o da exist√™ncia de tratamento e acesso aos dados;
privacy.right2: Corre√ß√£o: solicitar corre√ß√£o de dados incompletos, inexatos ou desatualizados;
privacy.right3: Anonimiza√ß√£o, bloqueio ou elimina√ß√£o: solicitar tratamento adequado de dados desnecess√°rios, excessivos ou tratados em desconformidade;
privacy.right4: Portabilidade: solicitar portabilidade dos dados a outro fornecedor de servi√ßo;
privacy.right5: Elimina√ß√£o: solicitar elimina√ß√£o dos dados pessoais tratados com consentimento;
privacy.right6: Revogar permiss√µes concedidas: voc√™ pode revogar permiss√µes a qualquer momento: Google: myaccount.google.com/permissions; Meta/Instagram: facebook.com/settings; WhatsApp: atrav√©s das configura√ß√µes da plataforma OnlyFlow
privacy.right7: Informa√ß√£o sobre compartilhamento: obter informa√ß√µes sobre entidades com as quais compartilhamos dados;
privacy.right8: Informa√ß√£o sobre n√£o consentimento: obter informa√ß√µes sobre a possibilidade de n√£o fornecer consentimento e suas consequ√™ncias.
privacy.rightContact: Para exercer seus direitos, entre em contato conosco atrav√©s do e-mail: contato@onlyflow.com.br
privacy.secIntro: Implementamos medidas t√©cnicas e organizacionais adequadas para proteger seus dados contra acesso n√£o autorizado, altera√ß√£o, divulga√ß√£o ou destrui√ß√£o. Isso inclui:
privacy.sec1: Criptografia de dados em tr√¢nsito (HTTPS) e em repouso;
privacy.sec2: Controles de acesso baseados em fun√ß√£o;
privacy.sec5: Treinamento de equipe em seguran√ßa de dados.
privacy.changes: Podemos atualizar esta Pol√≠tica de Privacidade periodicamente. Notificaremos voc√™ sobre mudan√ßas significativas publicando a nova pol√≠tica nesta p√°gina e atualizando a data de "√öltima atualiza√ß√£o". Recomendamos que voc√™ revise esta pol√≠tica periodicamente.
privacy.contactIntro: Se voc√™ tiver d√∫vidas sobre esta Pol√≠tica de Privacidade ou sobre como tratamos seus dados pessoais, entre em contato conosco:

site.title: OnlyFlow - Multi-Channel Communication Automation and Management Platform

hero.title: Multi-channel communication automation and management
hero.description: OnlyFlow is an automation and communication management platform that centralizes WhatsApp, Instagram and other channels in a single environment. Automate customer service, manage customer relationships and run campaigns at scale.

about.label: About the application
about.title: Everything you need to centralize your conversations in one place.
about.description1: OnlyFlow is a platform created for companies that need to automate customer service, manage customer relationships and run communication campaigns at scale. Connect multiple WhatsApp, Instagram and other channel accounts, create AI agents, build visual workflows and organize everything in the Kanban CRM.
about.description2: Also available in native apps for iOS and Android, with biometric authentication and real-time synchronization.
about.integrationsDesc: OnlyFlow connects to various services to offer a complete solution. All permissions are used exclusively for the functionalities described below.
about.google: Google (Sheets and Drive): lead synchronization with spreadsheets and file storage.
about.meta: Meta (Instagram): automations in DMs, comments and message sequences.
about.openai: OpenAI: AI agents, contextual responses and audio transcription.
about.typebot: Typebot: external chatbots connected to MindOnlyFlow.
about.whatsapp: WhatsApp: multiple instances, groups and conversation history.
about.privacyNote: We do not sell or share your data with third parties without consent. See

features.label: Everything you need
features.title: From first contact to conversion, in a single platform.
features.description: Manage the entire customer journey with artificial intelligence: acquisition, service, nurturing and sales closing.

aiAgents.desc: Create agents with OpenAI (GPT-4, GPT-3.5) to respond with context, maintain conversation memory and qualify leads.

whatsapp.desc: Connect multiple accounts, generate QR Codes, monitor status in real time and configure webhooks.

instagram.title: Instagram automations
instagram.desc: Connect via Meta OAuth, automate DMs, comments, message sequences and reports.

crm.title: Integrated Kanban CRM
crm.desc: Organize contacts in customizable columns, view history, send messages and filter quickly.

bulk.title: Bulk messaging
bulk.desc: Create segmented campaigns with scheduling, speed control, contact validation and reports.

workflows.title: Visual workflows
workflows.desc: Build flows in MindOnlyFlow with conditional nodes, Typebot, Google Sheets, OpenAI and webhooks.

howItWorks.label: How it works
howItWorks.title: Set up your automation in minutes.
howItWorks.description: In just a few steps you connect your channels, create AI agents, integrate with your systems and start scaling results.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: Connect your WhatsApp
step1.desc: Scan the QR Code and link your account in seconds. Secure and encrypted connection.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: Choose or create your AI agent
step2.desc: Use ready-made personas (salesperson, support, secretary) or configure behavior from scratch.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Integrate with your system
step3.desc: Configure APIs and webhooks to connect CRM, ERP, spreadsheets and any tool with API.

step4.label: Step 4
step4.title: Monitor and scale
step4.desc: Monitor conversations in Kanban CRM, run campaigns and track metrics in real time.

integrations.label: Connect to any system
integrations.title: Integrations with ERPs, CRMs, spreadsheets, automations and much more.
integrations.description: If it has an API or webhook, OnlyFlow connects. Create flows that communicate with your favorite tools in real time.

products.label: Our products
products.title: OnlyFlow solutions for different needs.
products.description: Discover other products developed by OnlyFlow to boost your communication and operations.

onlyHelper.name: OnlyHelper
onlyHelper.desc: Assistant and tools to optimize your daily workflow on OnlyFlow. Automations, shortcuts and integrated support.

onlyHelper.intro: Your site gets visitors. Your team wants to serve them well. What's missing is the bridge: a direct, real-time channel‚Äîno lost emails, no queue in hand. OnlyHelper is that bridge‚Äîa multi-channel communication platform to put chat support on your site, with an organized queue, history, and simple management.
onlyHelper.problem: Visitors give up when they have to fill out a form or wait for an email reply. Agents waste time switching tabs, spreadsheets, and "who took that ticket?". Managers don't know who's in the queue, on what topic, or who's handling it. OnlyHelper organizes everything: a button on the site, a real-time queue, a chat with history, and a management screen for the team lead.
onlyHelper.howTitle: How it works (from visitor to closure)
onlyHelper.howStep1: On your client's site ‚Äî A support button (embed) appears on the page. The visitor clicks.
onlyHelper.howStep2: Choose topic ‚Äî They see the configured topics (e.g. Sales, Technical support, Billing) and pick one. That creates the ticket and puts them in the right queue.
onlyHelper.howStep3: In the queue ‚Äî Whoever handles that topic on the team sees the visitor in the queue in real time. An agent clicks "Take" and the ticket is theirs.
onlyHelper.howStep4: In the chat ‚Äî Visitor and agent chat by message. They can send images (attachments). Everything is saved in the ticket history.
onlyHelper.howStep5: Closure ‚Äî When done, the agent closes the ticket. If the visitor returns later, they can open a new session and choose the topic again.
onlyHelper.howClosing: All in one dashboard: queue, active sessions, and chat, updating in real time.
onlyHelper.forVisitor: For the visitor: Support button on site, topic choice, real-time chat, attachments, position in queue.
onlyHelper.forAttendant: For the agent: Queue by topic, take ticket, chat with history and attachments, close ticket.
onlyHelper.forCollaborator: For the collaborator: Your sessions, status (Available/Busy/Away), summary on home.
onlyHelper.forAdmin: For the administrator: CRUD for topics, collaborator management, control of who sees what.
onlyHelper.tech: Technology: Real-time WebSocket, visitor session, authentication, responsive interface.
onlyHelper.benefits: One click on site ‚Ä¢ Live queue by topic ‚Ä¢ Chat with attachments ‚Ä¢ Topics at the center ‚Ä¢ Real-time home view ‚Ä¢ Management without chaos.
onlyHelper.forWho: Companies that want fast support on their site; teams that need queue and chat in one place; managers who want control by topic; sites that want an integrated support button (embed).
onlyHelper.why: Support that talks sells and retains. It's not just tickets or email: it's chat, queue, and the right topic at the right time. OnlyHelper brings together simplicity and organization so you don't miss any conversation.
onlyHelper.who: OnlyHelper is the product. OnlyFlow develops and maintains it. On the site and in the panel you see "Developed by OnlyFlow" in the footer.

testimonials.description: Automate WhatsApp, reduce response time and increase sales with a platform built for scale.
testimonials.testimonial1: OnlyFlow revolutionized our customer service. We increased sales by 40% just by automating the first contact with AI.
testimonials.testimonial2: Bulk messaging without blocks and integrated CRM. We replaced three tools with a single solution.
testimonials.testimonial3: We integrated with our system in less than 2 hours. The API is well documented and support is excellent.
testimonials.testimonial4: We use it for customer onboarding. The AI agent answers 80% of questions automatically. Game changer!
testimonials.testimonial5: Real-time webhooks work perfectly. The delivery reliability is impressive. 99.9% uptime.

faq.label: Frequently asked questions
faq.title: Get your questions about the platform answered.
faq.a1: Yes. We follow LGPD guidelines, process data based on appropriate legal bases and offer transparency about use and consent revocation.
faq.a2: Each plan has limits and speed controls to prevent blocks, but you can purchase additional volumes as needed.
faq.a3: Yes. We offer a 7-day free trial with unlimited resources so you can validate the solution in your daily routine.
faq.a4: We work with native integrations (WhatsApp, Instagram, OpenAI, Typebot, Google, CRMs, ERPs) and any system with REST API or webhooks.
faq.q5: Is data hosted on servers in Brazil?
faq.a5: Yes! All OnlyFlow infrastructure is hosted on servers in Brazil (AWS S√£o Paulo), ensuring low latency and full compliance with local regulations. We perform daily encrypted backups and maintain redundancy across multiple availability zones.
faq.q6: How does the AI agent setup work?
faq.a6: It's very simple! You choose a persona (salesperson, support, etc.), customize the base responses, set the tone of voice, and you're done. No coding required. The agent learns from conversations and you can adjust responses at any time from the dashboard. We also offer ready-made templates to get started in minutes.

cta.label: Ready to integrate and sell with AI?
cta.title: Join companies that already automate WhatsApp with OnlyFlow.
cta.description: Start your free trial today and see in practice how to automate communication, customer service and sales.
cta.note: 7 days free ‚Ä¢ Cancel anytime ‚Ä¢ LGPD compliant

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.description: Webhooks, message sending, CRM and group management.
docs.authIntro: All requests must include the authentication token in the Authorization header.
docs.authTokenNote: The token is unique per instance and can be found on the instance card on the Connections Manager page.
docs.sendTextDesc: Sends a text message to a contact.
docs.sendImageDesc: Sends an image with optional caption.
docs.sendVideoDesc: Sends a video with optional caption.
docs.sendAudioDesc: Sends an audio to a contact.
docs.moveContactDesc: Moves a contact from one column to another in the Kanban.
docs.useShortId: Use short_id (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) for convenience. See columns in GET /columns
docs.listContactsDesc: Returns all contacts for the instance.
docs.listContactsResponse: Response: status, count, contacts (id, phone, name, profilePicture, columnId, unreadCount, lastMessage, lastMessageAt)
docs.listColumnsDesc: Returns all columns with id, shortId (1-5), name, order, color.
docs.groupsIntro: Manage WhatsApp groups: list, create, update name/description/picture, settings, invite code, mention everyone, leave group.
docs.importantPhone: Phone format: Numbers only, with country code (e.g. 5511999999999).
docs.importantUrls: Media URLs: Must be public and accessible.
docs.importantShortIdCols: Short ID columns: Use 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 instead of UUIDs.
docs.importantToken: Token: Unique per instance, permanent until the instance is deleted.
docs.importantRealtime: Updates: Changes via API are reflected on the frontend via WebSocket.

status.title: Platform Status
status.description: Track in real time the status of OnlyFlow's main services.
status.error: Could not load platform status. Please try again in a few moments.
status.someIssues: Some services may be experiencing instability. Check details below.
status.noServices: No services returned by status API.

terms.title: TERMS OF USE ‚Äì ONLYFLOW
terms.intro1: Welcome to OnlyFlow Tecnologia Ltda. These Terms of Use govern access to and use of the OnlyFlow platform, including all its modules, mobile applications, APIs, integrations, features, websites and related services (collectively, the "Platform"). By accessing or using the Platform, you represent that you have read, understood and fully agree to these Terms.
terms.intro2: If you do not agree with any provision, you must not use the Platform.
terms.defOnlyFlow: OnlyFlow: SaaS platform for automation, communication management and multi-channel integration.
terms.defUser: User: Individual or legal entity that accesses or uses the Platform.
terms.defAccount: Account: The User's individual registration on the Platform.
terms.defContent: Content: Any data, messages, texts, images, videos, audio, flows, automations, integrations, code or information entered or processed by the User.
terms.defThirdParty: Third-Party Services: External services integrated with the Platform, including but not limited to Apple, Google, Meta (WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook), OpenAI and others.
terms.object1: OnlyFlow provides a technology platform that enables communication automation, customer management, integration with messaging channels, creation of automated flows, use of artificial intelligence agents and other features described on its official website.
terms.object2: OnlyFlow is not a telecommunications operator, does not provide financial services, does not intermediate third-party payments, does not act as a marketing agency, and does not participate in the content or communication carried out by Users.
terms.elig1: 3.1. The User represents that they have legal capacity to enter into this agreement.
terms.elig2: 3.2. The User is solely responsible for the information provided during registration and must keep it updated and accurate.
terms.elig3: 3.3. Each Account is personal and non-transferable. Sharing credentials is expressly prohibited.
terms.permittedIntro: The User agrees to use the Platform exclusively for lawful, ethical purposes and in compliance with applicable legislation, including but not limited to:
terms.permitted1: Brazilian Civil Rights Framework for the Internet (Law No. 12,965/2014)
terms.permitted2: General Data Protection Law ‚Äì LGPD (Law No. 13,709/2018)
terms.permitted4: Apple, Google and Meta policies and terms
terms.prohibitedIntro: It is expressly prohibited to use the Platform for:
terms.prohibited1: Sending spam, phishing, scams, fraudulent schemes or unsolicited messages
terms.prohibited3: Infringement of copyright, trademarks, trade secrets or intellectual property
terms.prohibited4: Illegal, offensive, discriminatory, violent, pornographic or hate content
terms.prohibited5: Attempts to breach, reverse engineer, exploit vulnerabilities or overload the Platform
terms.prohibited6: Use that violates WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Apple App Store, Google Play or associated API policies
terms.prohibitedClose: OnlyFlow may suspend or terminate immediately accounts that violate these rules, without prior notice.
terms.content1: 6.1. All Content entered or processed is the exclusive responsibility of the User.
terms.content2: 6.2. OnlyFlow does not review, approve or control Content generated or sent by Users.
terms.content3: 6.3. The User represents that they have all necessary rights over the Content used.
terms.content4: 6.4. OnlyFlow is not responsible for blocks, penalties, bans or restrictions imposed by third parties as a result of the User's Content.
terms.ai1: 7.1. The Platform may use proprietary or third-party artificial intelligence models.
terms.ai2: 7.2. AI-generated responses are automated, statistical and do not guarantee absolute accuracy.
terms.ai3: 7.3. The User is solely responsible for reviewing, validating and deciding on the use of generated responses.
terms.ai4: 7.4. OnlyFlow is not responsible for commercial, legal, financial or operational decisions made based on AI responses.
terms.third1: 8.1. The Platform allows integrations with third-party services, including but not limited to Apple, Google and Meta Platforms (WhatsApp, Instagram and Facebook).
terms.third2: 8.2. The User acknowledges that use of these integrations is subject, cumulatively, to these Terms and to the terms, policies and guidelines of the respective third parties, including:
terms.thirdList1: Apple App Store Review Guidelines and Apple Developer Program License Agreement
terms.thirdList2: Google Play Developer Distribution Agreement, Google API Services User Data Policy
terms.thirdList3: Meta Platform Terms, WhatsApp Business Messaging Policy, Instagram Platform Policy
terms.third3: 8.3. OnlyFlow acts exclusively as a technology provider, with no control over decisions, suspensions, limitations, audits or manual or automated reviews carried out by third parties.
terms.third4: 8.4. The User acknowledges that blocks, bans, sending limitations, quality downgrades, account suspensions, loss of numbers, WABA, BM or profiles resulting from misuse, policy violations or unilateral decisions by Meta, Google or Apple do not give rise to any right to refund, compensation or liability of OnlyFlow.
terms.third5: 8.5. OnlyFlow does not guarantee delivery rates, read rates, response rates, engagement or account approval on third-party platforms.
terms.plans1: 9.1. Access to certain features may depend on paid plans.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro1: OnlyFlow ("we", "our" or "application") is a multi-channel communication automation and management platform that centralizes WhatsApp, Instagram and other integrations in a single environment. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information.
privacy.agreement: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. This policy complies with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13,709/2018) and with the Google API Services User Data Policy.
privacy.s2Title: 2. Google Data - Integration with Google Sheets and Google Drive
privacy.s2_1Intro: The OnlyFlow application requests access to the following Google data through OAuth 2.0:
privacy.s2_1Sheets: Google Sheets API (scope: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets): Access to create, edit and manage Google Sheets spreadsheets; read and write data in cells; create new spreadsheets and sheets.
privacy.s2_1Drive: Google Drive API (scope: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.readonly): Read-only access to list the user's existing spreadsheets; view basic metadata (ID, name, URL). Does not access other Drive files, only Google Sheets spreadsheets.
privacy.s2_1Important: Important: The application does not access, read or modify other Google Drive data beyond Google Sheets spreadsheets. We do not access emails, documents, photos or any other type of file.
privacy.oauth1: Access request: When the user adds a "Spreadsheet" node in a workflow in MindOnlyFlow and clicks "Authenticate with Google", the system generates an OAuth 2.0 authorization URL.
privacy.oauth2: User consent: The user is redirected to Google's consent page, where they view the requested scopes and authorize access.
privacy.oauth3: Token acquisition: After authorization, Google returns an authorization code that is exchanged for access tokens (access_token and refresh_token).
privacy.oauth4: Secure storage: Tokens are stored in encrypted form in the database, associated exclusively with the user ID.
privacy.oauth5: Automatic renewal: The system uses the refresh_token to automatically renew the access_token when needed, without requiring new user authorization.
privacy.useIntro: Google data is used exclusively for:
privacy.use1: Creating new spreadsheets in the user's Google Sheets;
privacy.use2: Inserting contact data, conversations and workflow information into spreadsheets created or selected by the user (including leads from WhatsApp or Typebot, functioning as nodes within MindOnlyFlow);
privacy.use3: Listing existing spreadsheets for selection in the interface;
privacy.use4: Reading metadata (name, ID, URL) for display on the platform;
privacy.use5: Exclusive use within the OnlyFlow application itself, with no other purposes.
privacy.shareIntro: We do not share Google data with third parties. Specifically:
privacy.share1: Tokens and data accessed via Google APIs are not shared, sold or transferred;
privacy.share2: Communication occurs directly between the OnlyFlow server and official Google APIs, with no intermediaries;
privacy.share3: We do not sell, rent or share your Google data with advertising companies, data brokers or any other third party.
privacy.storage1: Only OAuth tokens (access_token and refresh_token) are stored in the database, associated with the user ID;
privacy.storage2: Tokens are stored on a secure server with encryption in transit (HTTPS) and at rest;
privacy.storage3: OnlyFlow does not store the content of Google spreadsheets; data remains exclusively in the user's Google account.
privacy.security2: Access restricted to the user only;
privacy.security3: Communication with Google APIs via HTTPS;
privacy.security4: Tokens never exposed in logs or public interfaces;
privacy.security5: Technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration or destruction.
privacy.retain: Token retention: OAuth tokens are kept while the user uses the Google Sheets integration feature. The user can revoke access at any time through Google's security settings.
privacy.delete1: Tokens are automatically removed when the user revokes access on Google;
privacy.delete2: The user may request deletion by contacting us at contato@onlyflow.com.br;
privacy.delete3: When the user deletes their OnlyFlow account, all associated tokens are automatically removed.
privacy.sheetData: Data in spreadsheets: Since data is inserted directly into the user's Google spreadsheets, it remains under the user's full control. OnlyFlow does not keep copies of this data and cannot access it after token revocation.
privacy.processLabel: Deletion process: To request deletion of stored tokens, the user may:
privacy.process1: Revoke access directly on Google (recommended) at myaccount.google.com/permissions;
privacy.process2: Contact our support by email at contato@onlyflow.com.br;
privacy.whatsapp: We collect messages, contacts, groups and conversation history for CRM and automation functionality. This data is used exclusively to provide communication and relationship management features.
privacy.meta: When you connect your Instagram account via Meta OAuth, we collect profile information, direct messages, comments and interactions to provide keyword-based automations, automatic responses and DM sending.
privacy.metaRevoke: You can revoke access at any time at facebook.com/settings
privacy.openai: For natural language processing and AI agents, we send conversations and context to OpenAI for processing. We do not store personal data on OpenAI. Processed data includes conversation messages and interaction history to provide contextual automatic responses, conversation memory, audio transcription and lead qualification.
privacy.openaiLink: For more information, see the OpenAI Privacy Policy.
privacy.typebot: When you use the Typebot integration, we share conversation and lead information for processing in Typebot, functioning as nodes within MindOnlyFlow.
privacy.registration: We collect information such as name, email, phone and other information provided during registration and use of the platform.
privacy.usage: We collect information about how you use our platform, including access logs, actions performed and configuration preferences.
privacy.howIntro: We use the data collected to:
privacy.how1: Provide, maintain and improve our services;
privacy.how5: Detect and prevent fraud and abuse;
privacy.how7: Sync leads with Google Sheets through workflows;
privacy.how8: Process messages with OpenAI for automatic responses;
privacy.cookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze service usage and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.rightsIntro: Under the LGPD, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.right1: Confirmation and access: request confirmation of the existence of processing and access to the data;
privacy.right2: Correction: request correction of incomplete, inaccurate or outdated data;
privacy.right3: Anonymization, blocking or deletion: request appropriate treatment of unnecessary, excessive or non-compliant data;
privacy.right4: Portability: request data portability to another service provider;
privacy.right5: Deletion: request deletion of personal data processed with consent;
privacy.right6: Revoke granted permissions: you can revoke permissions at any time: Google: myaccount.google.com/permissions; Meta/Instagram: facebook.com/settings; WhatsApp: through the OnlyFlow platform settings
privacy.right7: Information about sharing: obtain information about entities with whom we share data;
privacy.right8: Information about non-consent: obtain information about the possibility of not providing consent and its consequences.
privacy.rightContact: To exercise your rights, contact us at contato@onlyflow.com.br
privacy.secIntro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. This includes:
privacy.sec1: Data encryption in transit (HTTPS) and at rest;
privacy.changes: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by publishing the new policy on this page and updating the "Last update" date. We recommend that you review this policy periodically.
privacy.contactIntro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we process your personal data, contact us:
